segments.text: Over on the left, I see a much more dynamic situation unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A small boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s reaching into a "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's definitely getting cookies, I can see his hand inside!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate, presumably to catch his spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a feat of daring for such a young child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Next to him, a girl is eagerly reaching up, clearly expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the jar with such hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't tip over with him on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be quite a mess, and potentially a painful fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are quite the conspirators, working together so silently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little secret is safe for now, as the adult is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
